com.robodoot.roboapp

Class VirtualCat

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.robodoot.roboapp.VirtualCat
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MockVirtualCat, PololuVirtualCat

    public abstract class VirtualCat
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class which specifies a common interface for all "virtual cat" classes. All activities can be written to operate on a VirtualCat, and the actual implementation of the cat behavior will be provided by some concrete class that inherits from VirtualCat.
